sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' export const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, address, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const { totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating (reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated') : (({reviews.length}))} {address}
{city} {price} /per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ============ TOUR REVIEWS SECTION START ============ */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
); };
